languages.text: "Играет с разумом..." {n}Кибелла погружается в раздумья.{/n} "Все это — ложь, спектакль, затеянный, чтобы сломить мой дух? Взрастить паранойю? Изуверская игрушка... Мог ли он так поступить? О, конечно мог..."

"Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."
languages.original_text: "Играет с разумом..." {n}Кибелла погружается в раздумья.{/n} "Все это — ложь, спектакль, затеянный, чтобы сломить мой дух? Взрастить паранойю? Изуверская игрушка... Мог ли он так поступить? О, конечно мог..."

languages.text: «Jugando con mi mente...». {n}Kibellah reflexiona.{/n} «¿Entonces era todo una mentira? ¿Un espectáculo con la idea de doblegar mi espíritu? ¿Alimentar mi paranoia? Un juguete para sus juegos retorcidos... ¿Puede haber llegado a esos extremos? Pues claro que sí...».
languages.original_text: "Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."

traits.locale_text: «Jugando con mi mente...». {n}Kibellah reflexiona.{/n} «¿Entonces era todo una mentira? ¿Un espectáculo con la idea de doblegar mi espíritu? ¿Alimentar mi paranoia? Un juguete para sus juegos retorcidos... ¿Puede haber llegado a esos extremos? Pues claro que sí...».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: 「私の心をもてあそぶ…」{n}キベラは思いを巡らせる。{/n}「すべて嘘で、私の心を壊すために作ったショーだったのですか？私に思い込ませようとして？いびつなゲームのおもちゃ…あの方がそんなことを？…当然、するでしょうね…」
languages.original_text: "Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."

traits.locale_text: 「私の心をもてあそぶ…」{n}キベラは思いを巡らせる。{/n}「すべて嘘で、私の心を壊すために作ったショーだったのですか？私に思い込ませようとして？いびつなゲームのおもちゃ…あの方がそんなことを？…当然、するでしょうね…」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: “玩弄我的思想……”{n}绮贝菈思考着这个问题。{/n}“也就是说，这一切都是谎言？都是为了摧垮我的精神而设计出来的陷阱？为了满足我偏执的思想？让我沦为他变态游戏的玩具……他会这么做吗？他当然会……”
languages.original_text: "Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."

traits.locale_text: “玩弄我的思想……”{n}绮贝菈思考着这个问题。{/n}“也就是说，这一切都是谎言？都是为了摧垮我的精神而设计出来的陷阱？为了满足我偏执的思想？让我沦为他变态游戏的玩具……他会这么做吗？他当然会……”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: "Er spielt mit meinem Verstand ..." {n}Kibellah denkt über die Worte nach.{/n} "Dann war alles eine Lüge, ein Spektakel, um mich zu brechen? Um meine Paranoia zu nähren? Ein Spielzeug für seine perversen Spielchen ... Kann das wirklich sein? Natürlich ..."
languages.original_text: "Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."

traits.locale_text: "Er spielt mit meinem Verstand ..." {n}Kibellah denkt über die Worte nach.{/n} "Dann war alles eine Lüge, ein Spektakel, um mich zu brechen? Um meine Paranoia zu nähren? Ein Spielzeug für seine perversen Spielchen ... Kann das wirklich sein? Natürlich ..."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: « Il joue avec mon esprit... {n}songe Kibellah.{/n} Alors, tout ceci n'est qu'un mensonge, une mascarade destinée à briser ma volonté ? À entretenir ma paranoïa ? Moi, un pantin pour ses jeux pervers... En serait-il seulement capable ? Oui, ça lui ressemble bien... »
languages.original_text: "Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."

traits.locale_text: « Il joue avec mon esprit... {n}songe Kibellah.{/n} Alors, tout ceci n'est qu'un mensonge, une mascarade destinée à briser ma volonté ? À entretenir ma paranoïa ? Moi, un pantin pour ses jeux pervers... En serait-il seulement capable ? Oui, ça lui ressemble bien... »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: "Aklımla oyun oynuyor..." {n}Kibellah bunun üzerine düşünüyor.{/n} "Öyleyse her şey bir yalan, pes etmem için tasarlanmış bir gösteri miydi? Paranoyamı beslemek için miydi? Onun çarpık oyunları için bir oyuncak mıyım ben? Bunu yapmış olabilir mi? Elbette olabilir..."
languages.original_text: "Toying with my mind..." {n}Kibellah ponders this.{/n} "Then everything was a lie, a spectacle designed to break my spirit? To feed my paranoia? A toy for his twisted games... Could he have done so? Of course he could..."
